snippet.title: The Boomtown gameplay (PC Game, 1988)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for The Boomtown, Dos PC game produced by Mindscape in 1988 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/the-boomtown/4375/
The Boomtown is a simulation meant to be the first in a series of adventure games. It starts out in your fallout shelter, and gives you a list of supplies, such as food, fuel , herbs, books, arrows  and other survival necessities.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Fallout 2 - https://youtu.be/Jdbq_W11Wuw
Scavengers of the Mutant World - https://youtu.be/0d124ojFAhA
War In Middle Earth - https://youtu.be/8YdXc8JDwYM
